your compass which will track

until you die

items per category

Purchase tracking upgrade for
your compass which will track
each player on a specific team
until you die.

shop.tracker.bed-dont-destroy: Not all enemy beds are destroyed yet!
inv.hotbar.separator.title: Categories
inv.hotbar.reset.name: Reset to Default
inv.hotbar.reset.lore:
Reset your hotbar to the
default.
inv.hotbar.compass.name: Compass
inv.hotbar.compass.lore:
Click to change the position
compass will be set to on spawn.

§aIf no slot has a compass, you
§awill not be given one.
inv.hotbar.navbar.lore:
Click to change the position
to favor that slot when
purchasing an item this
category or on spawn.
shop.item.empty_slot.name: Empty Slot!
shop.item.empty_slot.lore:
This is a Quick Buy Slot!
&bSneak Click&7 any item in the
shop to add it here

shop.purchased.missing: You don't have enought %s! Need %s more!
shop.item.wool.name: Wool
shop.item.wool.lore:
Great for bridging across
islands. Turns into your team's
color.
shop.item.hard_clay.name: Hardened Clay
shop.item.hard_clay.lore: Basic block to defend your bed.
shop.item.glass.name: Blast-Proof Glass
shop.item.end_stone.name: End Stone
shop.item.end_stone.lore: Solid block to defend your bed.
shop.item.ladder.name: Ladder
shop.item.ladder.lore:
Useful to save cats stuck in
trees.
shop.item.wood.name: Wood
shop.item.wood.lore:
Good block to defend your bed.
Strong against pickaxes.
shop.item.obsidian.name: Obsidian
shop.item.stone_sword.name: Stone Sword
shop.item.iron_sword.name: Iron Sword
shop.item.diamond_sword.name: Diamond Sword
shop.item.stick.name: Stick (Knockback I)
shop.item.chainmail_armor.name: Permanent Chainmail Armor
shop.item.chainmail_armor.lore:
Chainmail leggings and boots
which you will always spawn
with.
shop.item.iron_armor.name: Permanent Iron Armor
shop.item.iron_armor.lore:
Iron leggings and boots which
you will always spawn with
shop.item.diamond_armor.name: Permanent Diamond Armor
shop.item.diamond_armor.lore:
Diamond leggings and boots which
you will always spawn with
shop.item.shears.name: Permanent Shears
shop.item.shears.lore:
Great to get rid of wool. You
will always spawn with these
shears.
shop.item.pickaxe_tier1.name: Wooden Pickaxe (Efficiency I)
shop.item.pickaxe_tier2.name: Iron Pickaxe (Efficiency II)
shop.item.pickaxe_tier3.name: Gold Pickaxe (Efficiency III, Sharpness II)
shop.item.pickaxe_tier4.name: Diamond Pickaxe (Efficiency III)
shop.item.pickaxe.lore:
This is an upgradable item.
It will lose 1 tier upon death!

You will permanently respawn
with at least the lower tier.
shop.item.axe_tier1.name: Wooden Axe (Efficiency I)
shop.item.axe_tier2.name: Iron Axe (Efficiency I)
shop.item.axe_tier3.name: Gold Axe (Efficiency II)
shop.item.axe_tier4.name: Diamond Axe (Efficiency III)
shop.item.axe.lore:
This is an upgradable item.
It will lose 1 tier upon death!

You will permanently respawn
with at least the lower tier.
shop.item.arrow.name: Arrow
shop.item.bow.name: Bow
shop.item.bow_power.name: Bow (Power I)
shop.item.bow_punch.name: Bow (Power I, Punch I)
shop.item.potion_speed.name: Potion of Speed II (45 seconds)
shop.item.potion_jump.name: Potion of Jump V (45 seconds)
shop.item.potion_invisibility.name: Potion of Invisibility (30 seconds)
shop.item.golden_apple.name: Golden Apple
shop.item.bedbug.name: Bedbug
shop.item.bedbug.lore:
Spawns silverfish where the
snowball lands to distract your
enemies. Lasts 15 seconds
shop.item.dream_defender.name: Dream Defender
shop.item.dream_defender.lore:
Iron Golem to help defend your
base. Lasts 4 minutes.
shop.item.fireball.name: Fireball
shop.item.fireball.lore:
Right-click to launch! Great to
knock back enemies walking on
thin bridges.
shop.item.tnt.name: TNT
shop.item.tnt.lore:
Instantly ignites, appropriate
to explode things!
shop.item.ender_pearl.name: Ender Pearl
shop.item.ender_pearl.lore:
The quickest way to invade enemy
bases.
shop.item.water_bucket.name: Water Bucket
shop.item.water_bucket.lore:
Great to slow down approaching
enemies. Can also protect
against TNT.
shop.item.bridge_egg.name: Bridge Egg
shop.item.bridge_egg.lore:
This egg creates a bridge in its
trail after being thrown.
shop.item.magic_milk.name: Magic Milk
shop.item.magic_milk.lore:
Avoid triggering traps for 30
seconds after consuming.
shop.item.sponge.name: Sponge
shop.item.compact_tower.name: Compact Pop-up Tower
inv.upgrade.separator.title: Purchasable
upgrade.missing-items: You don't have enough resources to unlock that upgrade!
upgrade.sharpness.name: Sharpened Swords
upgrade.sharpness.lore:
Your team permanently gains
Sharpness I on all swords and
axes!
upgrade.reinforced_armor.name: Reinforced Armor
upgrade.reinforced_armor.lore:
Your team permanently gains
Protection on all armor pieces!
upgrade.protection1.name: Protection I
upgrade.protection2.name: Protection II
upgrade.protection3.name: Protection III
upgrade.protection4.name: Protection IV
upgrade.maniac_miner.name: Maniac Miner
upgrade.maniac_miner.lore:
All players on your team
permanently gain Haste!
upgrade.haste1.name: Haste I
upgrade.haste2.name: Haste II
upgrade.forge.name: Iron Forge
upgrade.forge.lore:
Upgrade resource spawning on
your island!
upgrade.forge1.name: +50% Resources
upgrade.forge2.name: +100% Resources
upgrade.forge3.name: Spawn emeralds
upgrade.forge4.name: +200% Resources
upgrade.heal_pool.name: Heal Pool
upgrade.heal_pool.lore:
Creates a Regeneration field
around your base!
upgrade.dragon_buff.name: Dragon Buff
upgrade.dragon_buff.lore:
Your team will have 2 dragons
instead of 1 during deathmatch!
inv.choice_slot.title: Adding to Quick Buy...
trap.blindness.name: It's a trap!
trap.blindness.lore:
Inflicts Blindness and Slowness
for 8 seconds
trap.counter_offensive.name: Counter-Offensive Trap
trap.counter_offensive.lore:
Grants Speed II and Jump Boost
II for 15 seconds to allied
players near your base.
trap.alarm.name: Alarm Trap
trap.alarm.lore:
Reveals invisible players as
well as their name and team.
trap.miner_fatigue.name: Miner Fatigue Trap
notrap.1.name: Trap #1:
notrap.1.lore:
The first enemy to walk into
your base will trigger this
trap!
notrap.2.name: Trap #2:
notrap.2.lore:
The second enemy to walk into
your base will trigger this
trap!
notrap.3.name: Trap #3:
notrap.3.lore:
The third enemy to walk into
your base will trigger this
trap!
notrap.name: No Trap!
notrap.lore:
Purchasing a trap will queue it
here. Its cost will scale based
on the number of traps queued.
nexttrap.price.name: Next trap:
trap.title: TRAP TRIGGERED!
trap.subtitle: Your %s has been triggered!
trap.alarm.title: ALARM!!!
trap.alarm.subtitle: Alarm trap set off by %s team!

item.gamestyle.lore:
Click to change the style
of the interfaces
